mapper.select: select v.vendor_id,v.vendor_name,p.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME,v.vendor_req_date,v.vendor_s_name,v.vendor_s_tel,v.vendor_s_email from vendor_info v,product_item p where v.product_id=p.product_id and V.VENDOR_VALID='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VENDOR_INFO where vendor_valid='N'

SELECT v.vendor_name,p.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME,v.vendor_address,v.vendor_emp_no,v.vendor_iso_file,vendor_cert_file,v.vendor_req_date,v.vendor_id, v.vendor_q_name,v.vendor_q_tel,v.vendor_q_email,v.vendor_s_name,v.vendor_s_tel,v.vendor_s_email,c.category_name as CATEGORY_NAME FROM VENDOR_INFO v,product_item p,category_info c WHERE v.product_id=p.product_id and p.category_id=c.category_id and v.VENDOR_ID=#{VENDOR_ID}
mapper.update: update vendor_info set vendor_valid='Y' where VENDOR_ID=#{VENDOR_ID}
update vendor_info set vendor_valid='C' where VENDOR_ID=#{VENDOR_ID}
mapper.select: select vendor_id,vendor_name from vendor_info where vendor_name like '%'||#{vendor_name}||'%'
select p.product_id ,p.product_name from product_item p,vendor_info v where p.product_id=v.product_id
select count(*) from ncr_info n, audit_info a, vendor_info v where n.AUDIT_ID=a.AUDIT_ID and a.vendor_id=v.vendor_id and v.VENDOR_ID=#{VENDOR_ID}

select count (vendor_id)as total,vendor_id,count(ncr_comp)as comp from (select n.ncr_id ,a.audit_id,v.vendor_id ,n.NCR_COMP from ncr_info n, audit_info a, vendor_info v where n.audit_id= a.audit_id and a.vendor_id=v.vendor_id) group by vendor_id
select vendor_id,TRUNC(AUDIT_NEXT_DATE-sysdate) as validdate, AUDIT_RESULT from audit_info

select rownum rnum,v.vendor_id,v.vendor_name,c.category_name,p.product_name,v.vendor_q_name,v.vendor_q_email from vendor_info v,product_item p,category_info c where v.product_id=p.product_id and p.category_id=c.category_id and TRUNC(v.AUDIT_NEXT_DATE-sysdate) >0 and v.audit_result='Y'

select rownum rnum,v.vendor_id,v.vendor_name,c.category_name,p.product_name,v.vendor_q_name,v.vendor_q_email from vendor_info v,product_item p,category_info c where v.product_id=p.product_id and p.category_id=c.category_id and v.audit_result is null
SELECT * FROM CATEGORY_INFO ORDER BY CATEGORY_NAME
